about_the_game:
Story

On September 12th, 1977, the South Atlantic Shipping Company vessel SASC Abyss inexplicably lost communication and beached herself on a small desolate island south of Mwali. Years later Sadiiq Waaberi boards the dilapidated vessel in search of valuable artifacts and salvage, but dreams of fortune quickly become nightmares as the mystery behind the shipwreck begins to unfold.

Gameplay

Something lurks the desolate halls of the Abyss, and your only hope for survival is to avoid it by any means necessary. Hide in lockers and under desks, manage your breathing, and when all else fails... run.

Setting

Set in modern day, explore the 70s era wreckage of the ultra-large container vessel, rusted from years of exposure to the elements, and in complete disarray from the land collision she suffered years ago. You'll explore the deck, engine room, living quarters, and hospital ward as you learn more about her dark history.

Prologue

The story of Dead Abyss will be told episodically. This prologue chapter introduces players to the mystery of the Abyss' disappearance and provides a taste of what's to come.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A short first-person horror experience that places you in the rusted out hull of a mysteriously abandoned shipwreck. Search for clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the wreckage, but beware of the evil that lurks within.
